com.dragonboatrace.game.screens

Class BoatChoice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • com.dragonboatrace.game.screens.BoatChoice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class BoatChoice
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
    Represents the screen that allows the user to choose a boat for the race.
    Author:
    Jacob Turner

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture background
      The background texture.
      (package private) Boat[] boats
      The list of instantiated boats to be presented to the user as choices.
      (package private) int boatScale
      The size to scale the boat up to in the preview.
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<BoatType> BoatTypes
      The list of the types of boats the user can choose from.
      (package private) com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont font
      The font used to render the statistics and other UI elements.
      (package private) DragonBoatRace game
      The instance of DragonBoatRace to be used across the whole game.
      (package private) int selection
      The index of the current selection the user is looking at.

      BoatChoice(DragonBoatRace game)
      Creates a new screen for the boat choice of the user.
